about_the_game:
DLC for LOTUS Simulator: Streets Of LOTUS


From the developer of OMSI: Hamburg Day and Night and OMSI 2: HafenCity

  • Get behind the wheel of the first generation low-floor buses in Hamburg city transit
  • Authentic modeling of route 172 in the year 2005
  • Follow the major streets in Uhlenhorst, one-way residential roads in Barmbek up to Fuhlsbüttel Airport
  • Long diversified route with 19 kilometres and 33 bus stops
  • Realistic display of all streets and buildings with high-resolution textures
  • More than 1100 unique scenery objects
  • New AI vehicles of the early 2000s with performance optimization
  • Unique tree and vegetation objects complete the scenery
  • Highly detailed low-floor transit bus: stay tuned for more information...
  • Real time-tables and rosters with different end bus stops and variations
  • DLC in Early Access state: Content will grow together with LOTUS Simulator.

WARNING: Under development


This product is currently in Early Access state and will be continously updated like the main title LOTUS Simulator.
Also, new LOTUS engine features will be added when available, e.g. seasons, water and terrain design.

From the developer of OMSI: Hamburg Day and Night and OMSI 2: HafenCity

  • Get behind the wheel of the first generation low-floor buses in Hamburg city transit
  • Authentic modeling of route 172 in the year 2005
  • Follow the major streets in Uhlenhorst, one-way residential roads in Barmbek up to Fuhlsbüttel Airport
  • Long diversified route with 19 kilometres and 33 bus stops
  • Realistic display of all streets and buildings with high-resolution textures
  • More than 1100 unique scenery objects
  • New AI vehicles of the early 2000s with performance optimization
  • Unique tree and vegetation objects complete the scenery
  • Highly detailed low-floor transit bus: stay tuned for more information...
  • Real time-tables and rosters with different end bus stops and variations
  • DLC in Early Access state: Content will grow together with LOTUS Simulator.

WARNING: Under development


This product is currently in Early Access state and will be continously updated like the main title LOTUS Simulator.
Also, new LOTUS engine features will be added when available, e.g. seasons, water and terrain design.

name: LOTUS Simulator: Citybus Hamburg

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2,6 GHz, 4 cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Keyboard and mouse required
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.3, Internet required for activation and multiplayer, not all Intel onboard GPU supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3,5 GHz, 4 cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Keyboard and mouse required
  • Additional Notes: OpenGL 3.3, Internet required for activation and multiplayer, not all Intel onboard GPU supported

short_description: Take over bus route 172 in Hamburg, Germany. Set in 2005 with authentic low floor transit bus models, realistic buildings and streets and 1100 unique scenery objects. Also included in this LOTUS Simulator DLC: new AI vehicles and vegetation.
